text: Rodrigo Ribeiro Valente (born 15 February 2001) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for FC Porto B as a midfielder. ==Football career== He made his LigaPro debut for Porto B on 11 August 2019 in a game against Sporting Covilhã. ==References== ==External links== * * *Rodrigo Valente at Portuguese Football Federation Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:LigaPro players Category:FC Porto B players
title: Rodrigo Valente
